entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bow Valley (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bow Valley 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 49 %
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 1800 metres. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 late in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Snow level 1800 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
